::Astroblast::
"That may be a good idea," replies Astroblast after hearing 
Skullgrin's plan, "but I'm currently engaging some crazy Maximal. 
I'll try to pick up Squawktalk and Beastbox, but it becomes 
apparent that I wont be able to, continue with the first plan."


On 24 Feb 2001, at 9:58, dcoburn wrote:

> ::Triggerhappy(and Blowpipe)/Skullgrin::
> 
>          Triggerhappy swerves around in jet mode, and fires 2 shots from each photon cannon at Astro Train.  Blowpipe, who is in Triggerhappy's cockpit, opens it up and fires 2 shots each from his lasers(making 4 lasers in total).
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Skullgrin laughs.
> 
>        "Did ya hear that, Maximal?  I might just have a good day today!!!!!  Why, you may ask?  Oh you'll see!  And it won't be pretty," He taunted Condor.
> 
>        Skullgrin then had an idea.  He opened his com to Astroblast.
> 
>         "Astroblast, before we terminate this little Maximal let's have Beastbox and Squawktalk interrogate him," He sugeested.  
>
